attributes.action: Make sure the BBC retain the Neighbours TV show
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Neighbours TV show has been a national institution since 1986, and such an important British institution should not be allowed to fall outside the control of the British Broadcasting Corporation.  I petition the Prime Minister to intervene and keep this important programme on the national broadcasting network.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
